hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo 'toolkit.home='${toolkithome} > build.properties echo 'mqsiDir='${mqsiDir} >> build.properties echo 'project.name='${projectname} >> build.properties echo 'curDir='${WORKSPACE} >> build.properties echo 'messageflow.name='${messageflowname} >> build.properties echo 'RevisionNo=' >> build.properties
mkdir Utility echo 'svnhostusername='${username} > Utility/SVN.properties echo 'svnhostpassword='${password} >> Utility/SVN.properties echo 'svnhost='${svnhost} >> Utility/SVN.properties echo 'svnrepo='${svnrepo} >> Utility/SVN.properties echo 'projectname='${projectname} >> Utility/SVN.properties

svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert file:///E:/SVN_repository/branches/mDash/Sender/Build --force /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert file:///E:/SVN_repository/branches/mDash/Sender --force /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://icisr032/svn-poc/iib/libs --force /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://icisr032/svn-poc/iib/wsdl --force /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://icisr032/svn-poc/iib/TCPIPTestCase/Utility --force /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/Utility

rm -rf /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/Build
mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/temp chmod 757 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/temp
mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile chmod 757 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile
mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile/Sender chmod 757 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile/Sender
mkdir /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender chmod 757 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender_Build/barfile/Sender/SPN_TRAD_ORM_Sender
